channel.title: Gnomes Are Friends, Not Food
channel.description: All things EQ2 and even some that aren't

item.title: The Station Explains Guild Advancement
item.description:
Summary Just as player characters have levels that reflect their achievements within the game, so do guilds. Guild members earn experience toward their guild's level primarily through the completion of special city tasks. Unique rewards and items become available at reduced prices as the guild advances in level and its members gain prestige and status within the city.
Guild Advancement Explained
item.author: Host Account

item.title: PATCH DAY! Hold on to your shinies!
item.description: Who knows what got nerfed..... The Mojo knows! Read more for details...
item.author: Host Account

item.title: HO Tables have been reworked
item.description: The HO tables have been re-worked to be easier to read and the tutorials are almost done. We are adding a screenshot section and more pictures/screenshots to the tutorials. All this feedback has been really helping us create a better site. If you have questions about heroic opportunities or the game in general, stop by our forums. We'll do our best to help you out. Thanks again for all the emails and posts -Kresken
item.author: Host Account

item.title: Changes to Heroic Opportunities
item.description: Heroic Opportunities changed a bit on the latest patch. No longer will just hitting a skill/spell start a heroic opportunity.
